word:
It has been a tremendous struggle for them to advance in the face of great financial embarrassment. They planned and contrived and devised in every way, with self-denial and self-sacrifice, to bring the school through, and to free it from its burden of debt. Now they begin to see that the way pointed out was the way of the Lord's leading. This is the lesson the Lord would have many more to learn. --Ms 98, 1902, pp. 5-10. ("Consideration to be 


                                    -412- 

Shown to Those Who in Their Work Have Wrestled with Difficulties," July 10, 1902.)
